document.full_text: san mateo county is being sued to change the way its board of supervisors is elected. although asian and hispanic voters now make up half the population, four of five current supervisors are white.
document.title: san mateo's asian and hispanic voters speak up
lines_and_colors: san mateo county is being sued to change the way its board of supervisors is elected. although asian and hispanic voters now make up half the population, four of five current supervisors are white.
